name: 2022 5th International Conference on Computer Graphics and Virtuality
content: Publicationï¼š As the workshop of ICDSP 2022, ICCGV 2022 accepted papers will be published in the ICDSP 2022 conference proceedings as a special chapter, which will be archived in the Online Digital Library, and submitted to Ei Compendex and Scopus for index and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
